However, historically, Ayrshire has seen foreign investment in sectors such as renewable energy, tourism, and manufacturing. The region's proximity to Glasgow and Glasgow Prestwick Airport has also attracted foreign investment in the aerospace industry.

In comparison to other cities in Scotland, Edinburgh and Glasgow are traditionally the leading destinations for foreign investment. These cities have seen investment in a range of sectors, including financial services, technology, and life sciences. However, other regions in Scotland, such as Aberdeen and Dundee, have also seen significant investment in sectors such as oil and gas and biotechnology.
